str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A primary verb; to leave, i.e. to fail or be absent.
Wisdom, insight, skill (human or divine), intelligence. From sophos; wisdom.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To ask, request, petition, demand. Of uncertain derivation; to ask.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
Simply, sincerely, graciously, bountifully. Adverb from haplous; bountifully.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: To reproach, revile, upbraid. From oneidos; to defame, i.e. Rail at, chide, taunt.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
